short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives you relevant data to make better decisions on Amazon Marketplace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Amazon Data App is Chrome extension that gives the user more information about various products and listing on the amazon.com market place. The purpose of this data is to be able to make more informed decisions about selling products on the amazon marketplace.
